title: France panorama. [No. 70/49]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The laser and industry - industrial applications of French lasers, machine tools, data-processing, magnetic passports, and public works. 2. The laser and space - the French laser reflector on the Soviet Luna 17 flight. 3. The publishing world - the 1970 Goncourt Literary Prize goes to Michel Tournier; backstage at “Le Seuil”, one of France’s major publishing houses. The arts - the “Beaudin” Exhibition at the Grand Palais.
